author: macfarla
content:
Querying the status of allowing block number parameter as decimal integer.

This was previously on the RPC call agenda https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1413 as
“standardize the API to prefer decimal integers over hex for all numbers. Hex should be reserved for raw data fields. Large integers will likely need to be quoted strings.”

There are 3 rpc-compat tests failing for Besu because we accept non-hex block number: debug_getRaw[Block|Header|Receipts]/get-invalid-number
